p: In addition, we tested the hypothesis whether the relationship between cyberchondria and the current virus anxiety (March 2020) is moderated by trait health anxiety. Trait health anxiety was shown to be a significant moderator in the relationship between cyberchondria related to the COVID-19 pandemic and the current virus anxiety (B = -.032, p = .004; explanation of variance of the whole model R 2 = 20.85 %, p < .001). Fig. 1 B illustrates the moderation analysis.
